    An offline onlineClient to play the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OfflineClient

        public OfflineClient​(Player player1,
                     Player player2,
                     boolean shuffleOrder)
        Creates a LocalClient to play the game. Make sure to add an InputHandler and some listeners.
        Parameters:
        {@code player1} - the first player
        {@code player2} - the second player
        {@code shuffleOrder} - whether to randomly shuffle the starting order

    • Method Detail

        Informs the listeners of any changes to the game.
        Parameters:
        {@code message} - the message

      • setInputHandler

        public void setInputHandler​(OfflineTextInputHandler inputHandler)

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts the pentago game main loop.
        First the (still empty) board is shown. Then the game is played until it is over. Players can make a move one after the other. In every change in board (including placing marble and rotating the board) , the changed game situation is printed.
